page.title: 20BRAMPTON VILLAGE INSTITUTE
page.content:
A tin & wood building,but well cared for,this hall has a surprising amount of room.Two domino drives are held monthly,with 40-80 people attending. One is arranged by the Institute committee to cover running costs, & the other is a charity event,which has been going on successfully for 8 years in aid of Kidney Research.The WI use the hall for monthly meetings,& the church Tuesday Group hold a childrens' Christmas party.In 1985,a school party from France used the building during a 2 weeks camping holiday nearby, & a church group,walking the Pennine Way, stayed overnight.
{THANKS: {This Survey was compiled by Members of {Dufton Womens'Institute and their {friends,to whom they offer their {sincere thanks.}
